column4: Hey, I'm using Gnome with Window Selector. Sometimes it doesn't display all of the windows. Anyone know what this is about?
I've had this issue now and again.  I think it's Compiz occasionally arguing with Metacity.  You can explicitly set some options in gconf-editor
Could you elaborate on what that might be, or should I just go digging around?
Honestly, I don't really know the specifics.  I just fiddled around with it trying different settings and eventually got it to work.
